headline: Big Business Vows to Fight Climate Change. How? When?
abstract: In Davos, business leaders were newly vocal about the danger, though they gave few details about how they would reform their practices.
lead_paragraph: DAVOS, Switzerland â€” Business titans who for decades brushed off warnings about climate change arrived at the annual World Economic Forum this week ready to show their newfound enthusiasm for the cause.
keywords: Carbon Caps and Emissions Trading Programs
